column2: quit -- quit the game. Your progress will be saved. Shortcut(s): q exit
play playerName cardIndex -- play a card. Card numbers can be found with -> inspecthand. Shortcut(s): p
inspecthand playerName -- show a players hand. Shortcut(s): ih inspecth
inspectdeck -- show what cards are left in the deck. Shortcut(s): id inspectd
inspectcard playerName cardIndex -- inspect a card. Displays effect and rarity. Shortcut(s): i inspect ic inspectc
